bibl.title: Infra-red Photography of Ostraca and Papyri.
bibl.note: [Introduction.] - Case-studies: Ostraca [from the praesidium Dios in the Eastern Desert]; - Papyrus; Carbonized papyri; - Skin. - A brief survey of what infrared is. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: BÜLOW-JACOBSEN Adam, Infra-red Photography of Ostraca and Papyri.
[Introduction.] - Case-studies: Ostraca [from the praesidium Dios in the Eastern Desert]; - Papyrus; Carbonized papyri; - Skin. - A brief survey of what infrared is. - Conclusion.
